title: Gillingham F.C.
summary: Gillingham Football Club is a professional association football club based in the town of Gillingham, Kent, England. The only Kent-based club in the Football League, the "Gills" play their home matches at Priestfield Stadium. The team competes in League One, the third tier of the English football league system.  Steve Evans has been the team's manager since 2019 and Paul Scally has been the club's owner and chairman since 1995.
